sentences.literal: Qin Er Shi especially took it as entertainment.

sentences.chinese: 丞相李斯進諫曰：「放棄詩書，極意聲色，祖伊所以懼也；
sentences.literal: Chancellor Li Si advanced remonstrance saying: 'Abandoning poetry and books, exhausting intention on sounds and colors, this is what Zu Yi feared;

sentences.chinese: 輕積細過，恣心長夜，紂所以亡也。」
sentences.literal: Lightly accumulating small faults, indulging heart in long nights, this is why Zhou perished.'

sentences.chinese: 趙高曰：「五帝、三王樂各殊名，示不相襲。
sentences.literal: Zhao Gao said: 'The Five Emperors and Three Kings' music each had different names, showing they did not copy each other.

sentences.chinese: 上自朝廷，下至人民，得以接歡喜，合殷勤，非此和說不通，解澤不流，亦各一世之化，度時之樂，何必華山之騄耳而後行遠乎？」
sentences.literal: From the court above, down to the people below, they could connect happiness and joy, unite diligence and care. Without this, harmonious persuasion would not pass through, dissolving favor would not flow. Each is also one era's transformation, timely joy. Why must it be the Hua Mountain liu'er and only then travel far?'

sentences.chinese: 高祖過沛詩三侯之章，令小兒歌之。
sentences.literal: Gao Zu, passing through Pei, recited the chapters of the Three Hou, commanded children to sing them.

sentences.chinese: 高祖崩，令沛得以四時歌儛宗廟。
sentences.literal: When Gao Zu passed away, he commanded that Pei could use the four seasons to sing and dance in the ancestral temple.

sentences.chinese: 孝惠、孝文、孝景無所增更，於樂府習常肄舊而已。
sentences.literal: Xiao Hui, Xiao Wen, Xiao Jing made no additions or changes; at the Music Bureau they only practiced the constant and reviewed the old.

sentences.chinese: 至今上即位，作十九章，令侍中李延年次序其聲，拜為協律都尉。
sentences.literal: Until the present emperor ascended the throne, he made nineteen chapters, commanded the palace attendant Li Yan Nian to sequence their sounds, appointed him as Harmonious Music Commandant.

sentences.chinese: 通一經之士不能獨知其辭，皆集會五經家，相與共講習讀之，乃能通知其意，多爾雅之文。
sentences.literal: Scholars who master one classic cannot alone know their words; all gather the Five Classics scholars, mutually together lecture, practice, and read them; only then can they fully understand their meaning, many refined and elegant writings.

sentences.chinese: 漢家常以正月上辛祠太一甘泉，以昏時夜祠，到明而終。
sentences.literal: The Han house constantly in the first month, first xin day, sacrificed to Tai Yi at Gan Quan, using dusk time for night sacrifice, reaching dawn and ending.
There constantly were shooting stars passing over the sacrificial altar.

sentences.chinese: 使僮男僮女七十人俱歌。
sentences.literal: He made young boys and young girls, seventy people together, sing.

sentences.chinese: 春歌青陽，夏歌朱明，秋歌西暤，冬歌玄冥。
sentences.literal: Spring sang Qing Yang, summer sang Zhu Ming, autumn sang Xi Huang, winter sang Xuan Ming.
